summary_text: Diligant and patriotic candidate with excellent general awareness and administrative aptitude. Seeking a position in the government sector to contribute to nation-building through efficient public service.
common_mistakes: Using corporate format. Government jobs often need 'Biodata' asking for Age, Caste, Father's Name, Marital Status - unnecessary in private jobs but mandatory here.
seo_title: Government Job Biodata Format PDF (2026) | Sarkari Naukri Format
meta_description: Download standard Biodata format for Government Jobs (Sarkari Naukri). Accepted for Police, Railways, Clerical, and State Government exams. Includes personal details section.

faqs.q: Why is Biodata different from Resume?
faqs.a: Biodata focuses on factual personal data (DOB, Height, Caste, Address) and Qualifications. It is less about 'marketing' yourself and more about 'eligibility' verification.

industry_context: Government recruitment is eligibility-based. Documents must exactly match claims (mark sheets, caste certificates).

summary_text: Candidate with strong academic record and preparation for competitive exams. Proficient in reasoning, aptitude, and general studies. Dedicated to public service excellence.
common_mistakes: Over-styling. Government applications should be plain text or simple table formats. Avoid color, photos (unless asked), or fancy fonts.
seo_title: Sarkari Naukri Resume Format Download (2026) | Free Template
meta_description: Clean, simple resume format designed for Sarkari Naukri online applications. Focuses on clarity, eligibility, and accurate data representation.

faqs.q: What is the best resume format for Sarkari Naukri in 2026?
faqs.a: The best format is a simple, one-page layout using standard fonts like Arial or Times New Roman. Avoid graphics, multi-column layouts, and photos unless specifically asked. Most government portals in India prefer clean PDFs that can be easily parsed or printed for manual review.

faqs.q: Should I use a different resume for State vs Central Government jobs?
faqs.a: Yes. Central government jobs (like Railways, SSC) often follow a more standardized 'Biodata' or application form. State government jobs may have specific local language requirements or format preferences. Always check the official notification for any prescribed format.

faqs.q: Is the ATS relevant for government job applications?
faqs.a: While traditional 'ATS' systems are less common in public sector direct recruitment, many online portals (like NCS potal) use keyword-matching to filter applicants. Using clear, eligibility-focused keywords as per the job notification is essential.

industry_context: Accuracy is key. One wrong date or spelling can lead to disqualification in document verification.

summary_text: Aspiring Banker with strong numerical aptitude and financial awareness. Qualified IBPS/SBI PO Mains. detail-oriented and customer-friendly, seeking a challenging role in banking operations.
common_mistakes: Not mentioning exam qualification status (IBPS/SBI), missing computer certification (often mandatory), or generic objectives.
seo_title: Bank PO Resume Format India (2026) | IBPS SBI PO Interview Resume
meta_description: Best resume format for Bank PO interviews (SBI, IBPS). Highlight your aptitude, banking knowledge, and exam scores. Professional template for bank jobs.

faqs.q: Is the resume for the interview or application?
faqs.a: Mostly for the interview stage. Panelists review it to ask questions about your background and biodata.

industry_context: Banking interviews (PO/Clerk) focus on personality and awareness. Your resume sets the direction of the interview questions.

summary_text: Passionate Educator (B.Ed) with expertise in [Subject] and 3+ years of teaching experience. Skilled in student engagement, lesson planning, and classroom management. CTET/STET qualified. Committed to holistic student development.
common_mistakes: Not mentioning B.Ed/TET qualification clearly, missing subject specialization, or failing to mention grade levels taught (Primary/Secondary).
seo_title: Teacher Resume Format India (2026) | PGT TGT PRT Template
meta_description: Download best Teacher resume format. ATS-optimized for US schools (CBSE/ICSE/State). Includes B.Ed, CTET, and subject skills sections.

faqs.q: Should I mention private tuition experience?
faqs.a: Yes! Teaching is teaching. Mention the class levels, subjects, and student results improvement.

industry_context: Schools look for specific qualifications (B.Ed, TET) and subject mastery. Demo classes are common; your resume gets you to the demo.
